meanings.definition: A dish consisting of vegetables such as peppers or grape leaves stuffed with a seasoned mixture of rice, meat, and spices.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious dolma for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone enjoyed the tasty dolma.
meanings.sent3: The dolma was so good, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The dolma was a flavorful surprise in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly cooked dolma filled the room.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or eating dolma.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to make dolma from my grandma.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the table for the dolma feast.
meanings.sent3: We had a dolma-making competition at the cooking class.
meanings.sent4: Eating dolma together always brings us closer.
meanings.sent5: The joy of dolma preparation is in the shared experience.
